Adaptions

The following adaptions to specific products are currently available:

Attocube ASC500 SPM Controller

  • asc500.h contains definitions of constants for parameters to be used with the functions of daisybase.h.
  • asc500helpers.h defines a set of convenience functions for controller access on top of daisybase. The source code is also included (asc500helpers.c) and may be used freely in application projects. asc500helpers.dll provides the functions for non-C projects.

ANC350

  • anc350_client.h contains definitions of constants for parameters to be used with the functions of daisybase.h.

ECC100

  • ecc.h contains definitions of constants for parameters to be used with the functions of daisybase.h.
  • ecc_helpers.h defines a set of convenience functions for controller access on top of daisybase. The source code is also included (ecc_helpers.c) and may be used freely in application projects. ecc_helpers.dll provides the functions for non-C projects.

QRNG

  • qrng.h contains definitions of constants for parameters to be used with the functions of daisybase.h.

quTau

  • tdceval.h contains definitions of constants for parameters to be used with the functions of daisybase.h.
  • tdc_helpers.h defines a set of convenience functions for controller access on top of daisybase. The source code is also included (tdc_helpers.c) and may be used freely in application projects. tdc_helpers.dll provides the functions for non-C projects.
